# plasticmaps

```{r example}
library(plasticmaps)
ggarrange(create_norcal_map(), 
          create_socal_map(),
          labels = c("A", "B"), 
          widths = c(0.9, 1.1),
          common.legend = TRUE,
          ncol = 2, nrow = 1)
```
